style.css.content:
/* PicoCSS v1 placeholder for offline use. For the real version, visit https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@picocss/pico@1/css/pico.min.css */
body{font-family:system-ui,sans-serif;line-height:1.6;margin:0;padding:0;background:#fff;color:#333}h1,h2,h3{line-height:1.2}img{max-width:100%;height:auto;display:block}nav ul{list-style:none;display:flex;gap:1rem;margin:0;padding:1rem;background:#222;color:#fff;justify-content:space-between}nav a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none}main.container{padding:2rem}section{margin-bottom:3rem}footer{padding:2rem 0;text-align:center;border-top:1px solid #ccc}

conversation.md.content: User requested Option B: local images and local PicoCSS version of the Goulet & Co. redesign. The project should include index.html, css/pico.min.css, and /images folder with Unsplash assets.
